item.description:
We began this month by understanding how quantum physics is shaping a higher level of understanding “Reality.”

Simply stated, “Every person creates his or her own reality and experiences it subjectively.” We explored the connection between our Universe and us, how the Matrix works, and that we communicate through our emotions. We explored the Art of Consciously Creating, and learned that feeling is the language that Speaks to the Universe.

This week we will explore:

  • Three Universal Fears - Abandonment, Low Self-Esteem, Lack of Trust
  • Read the Reflections of our ownMirror - Judgment, Give/Take away, Dark Night of our Soul, Act of Compassion

Join us for an evening of learning more about what makes the Law of Attraction work.

Facts will be taken from Gregg Braden’s book The Divine Matrix: Bridging Time, Space, Miracles, and Belief.


We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: Please enter through the side door.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Universe is Talking to Us, Are we Listening?
